Judicial co-operation in criminal matters: mutual recognition to a European evidence warrant. Framework Decision
Conservation of fishery resources: sustainable exploitation in the Mediterranean Sea
Visa: uniform format with photograph in 2005, biometric identification (amend. Regulation (EC) No 1683/95)
Residence permits: uniform format, biometric identifiers
UN Convention against transnational organised crime (UNTOC): protocol against the smuggling of migrants by land, sea and air
UN Convention against transnational organised crime: protocol to prevent, suppress and punish trafficking in persons, especially women and children
EC/Sri Lanka agreement: readmission of persons residing without authorisation
Comitology: exercise of implementing powers conferred to the Commission
Combating certain forms and expressions of racism and xenophobia by means of criminal law. Framework Decision
Asylum: granting and withdrawing refugee status, minimum standards on procedures, Common European Asylum System
EC/Turkmenistan agreement: interim agreement on trade
